tools.name: call_aws
tools.description: Execute AWS CLI commands with validation and error handling. Supports all AWS services including RDS, S3, IAM, CloudTrail, EC2, Config, GuardDuty.

command.description: AWS CLI command to execute (e.g., 'aws rds describe-db-instances', 'aws s3api list-buckets')

tools.name: suggest_aws_commands
tools.description: Recommends AWS CLI commands based on natural language queries. Provides the complete set of parameters for the 5 most likely commands.

query.description: Natural language description of what you want to do (e.g., 'list all RDS instances with encryption status')

tools.name: get_execution_plan
tools.description: Experimental tool that provides structured workflows for complex AWS tasks.

task.description: Description of complex AWS task requiring multiple steps
